subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Ligety, the reigning champion, had the fastest first run in Beaver Creek, Colo., but was overtaken by Marcel Hirscher of Austria, who had the fastest second run.
snippet: Ligety, the reigning champion, had the fastest first run in Beaver Creek, Colo., but was overtaken by Marcel Hirscher of Austria, who had the fastest second run.
